articles.title: Cocoa and tea may protect your heart from the hidden damage of sitting
articles.description: Scientists found that high-flavanol foods can prevent the decline in blood vessel function that occurs after prolonged sitting. articles.title: Look of the Week: Blackpink headline Coachella in Korean hanboks
articles.description: Bringing the second day of this year's Coachella to a close, K-Pop girl group Blackpink made history Saturday night when they became the first Asian act to ever headline the festival. articles.title: Scientists identify secret ingredient in Leonardo da Vinci paintings
articles.description: "Old Masters" such as Leonardo da Vinci, Sandro Botticelli and Rembrandt may have used proteins, especially egg yolk, in their oil paintings, according to a new study.

articles.title: Silicon Valley Bank collapse renews calls to address disparities impacting entrepreneurs of color
articles.description: When customers at Silicon Valley Bank rushed to withdraw billions of dollars last month, venture capitalist Arlan Hamilton stepped in to help some of the founders of color who panicked about losing access to payroll funds.

articles.title: GUEST OPINION: Why blanket upzoning won’t deliver the affordability Calgary needs
articles.description: Calgary is in a housing crunch, and two commentators from the Fraser Institute recently argued in these pages that blanket upzoning is essential to making new homes “faster and cheaper.” It’s a tidy theory.
